code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState="";var ProductSlice=createSlice({name:'product',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setProduct:function setProduct(state,action){return action.payload;},deleteProduct:function deleteProduct(state){return"";}}});var _ProductSlice$actions=ProductSlice.actions,setProduct=_ProductSlice$actions.setProduct,deleteProduct=_ProductSlice$actions.deleteProduct;export{setProduct,deleteProduct};export default ProductSlice.reducer;
